item.title: A technician's take: Berkshire Hathaway is primed for a comeback
item.description: A technician sees a pattern showing Berkshire Hathaway is about to rise.

item.title: Three picks from investor Kevin Simpson to capitalize on this market melt-up
item.description: A discussion with Kevin Simpson, founder and chief executive officer, Capital Wealth Planning.

item.title: In unusual occurrence, both the Dow and small caps could be headed for a breakout, charts suggest
item.description: Frank Cappelleri breaks down the charts in the small cap and Dow ETFS.

item.title: Warren Buffett's secret stock could be revealed imminently. What it could be
item.description: CNBC Pro used Morningstar data to identify wide moat stocks in the industrial sector.

item.title: Crypto exchange Bullish prices IPO at $37 per share, above expected range, ahead of NYSE debut
item.description: Crypto exchange Bullish priced its IPO at $37 per share, above its expected range, giving it a market value of more than $5 billion.
